param.name: prefix
param.label: Prefix for Section:
param.description: The section name can be prefixed with fixed text to help clarify the source

param.name: suffix
param.label: Suffix for Section:
param.description: The section name can include a suffix for clarity.

param.name: href
param.label: Type of link to show:
param.description: Download the file direct, display the details page or display the category page.

param.name: search_name
param.label: Search Name:
param.description: Search the name of the download file.

param.name: search_description
param.label: Search Description:
param.description: Search the description of the download file.

param.name: search_cat
param.label: Search Category Name:
param.description: Search the Category name for each download.
